1.1.name: wordpress/dotmailer-sign-up-widget
1.1.description: Add the dotMailer sign-up form plugin to your site to allow your visitors to sign up to your newsletter and email marketing campaigns, sent using the dotMailer email marketing system. The email address of your new subscriber can be added to one or more dotMailer address books, which you can specify within your settings in WordPress. If you're not already a dotMailer user you can find out more about dotMailer at (http://www.dotmailer.co.uk)
